Title: Faraway, So Close!
Writer: Wim Wenders (script by), Ulrich Zieger (script by), Richard Reitinger (script by), Ulrich Zieger (dialogue by)
Actors: Otto Sander, Peter Falk, Horst Buchholz, Mikhail Gorbachev
Plot: A group of angels in the German capital look longingly upon the life of humans.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 4 wins & 6 nominations.
